---
title: Article Writing
weight: 1
bookHref: https://github.com/OpenMLRL/LLM_Collab_Writing
---

Collaborative summarization and expansion tasks for pairs (or teams) of LLMs.
The reference implementation lives in the
[LLM_Collab_Writing](https://github.com/OpenMLRL/LLM_Collab_Writing) repository
and includes:

- **TLDR** – distills Reddit threads into concise summaries.
- **ArXiv Introductions** – grows short abstracts into multi-paragraph drafts.
